verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto him by the oaks <S%H436><s%> of Mamre <S%H4471><s%>, as he sat <S%H3427><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> door <S%H6607><s%> in the heat <S%H2527><s%> of the day <S%H3117><s%>;

and he lifted up <S%H5375><s%> his eyes <S%H5869><s%> and looked <S%H7200><s%>, and <S%H7969><s%>, lo, three men <S%H582><s%> stood <S%H5324><s%> over against him <S%H7200><s%>: and when he saw them <S%H7323><s%>, he ran to meet <S%H7125><s%> them from the tent <S%H168><s%> door <S%H6607><s%>, and bowed <S%H7812><s%> himself to the earth <S%H776><s%>,

and said <S%H559><s%>, My lord <S%H136><s%>, if now I have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in thy sight <S%H5869><s%>, pass not away <S%H5674><s%>, I pray thee <S%H5650><s%>, from thy servant:

let now a little <S%H4592><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> be fetched <S%H3947><s%>, and wash <S%H7364><s%> your <S%H4994><s%> feet <S%H7272><s%>, and rest yourselves <S%H8172><s%> under the tree <S%H6086><s%>:

and I will fetch <S%H3947><s%> a morsel <S%H6595><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>, and strengthen ye your <S%H5582><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%>; after that <S%H310><s%> ye shall pass on <S%H5674><s%>: forasmuch as ye are come <S%H5674><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%>. And they said <S%H1696><s%>, So do <S%H6213><s%>, as thou hast said <S%H559><s%>.

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> hastened <S%H4116><s%> into the tent <S%H168><s%> unto Sarah <S%H8283><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Make ready quickly <S%H4116><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> measures <S%H5429><s%> of fine <S%H5560><s%> meal <S%H7058><s%>, knead <S%H3888><s%> it <S%H6213><s%>, and make <S%H6213><s%> cakes <S%H5692><s%>.

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> ran <S%H7323><s%> unto the herd <S%H1241><s%>, and fetched <S%H3947><s%> a calf <S%H1121><s%> tender <S%H7390><s%> and good <S%H2896><s%>, and gave <S%H5414><s%> it unto the servant <S%H5288><s%>; and he hasted <S%H4116><s%> to dress it <S%H6213><s%>.

And he took <S%H3947><s%> butter <S%H2529><s%>, and milk <S%H2461><s%>, and the calf <S%H1121><s%> which he had dressed <S%H6213><s%>, and set <S%H5414><s%> it before them <S%H6440><s%>; and he stood <S%H5975><s%> by them under the tree <S%H6086><s%>, and they did eat <S%H398><s%>.
And they said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H346><s%>, Where is Sarah <S%H8283><s%> thy wife <S%H802><s%>? And he said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H168><s%>, in the tent.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, I will certainly <S%H7725><s%> return <S%H7725><s%> unto thee when the season <S%H6256><s%> cometh round <S%H2416><s%>; and <S%H8283><s%>, lo, Sarah thy wife <S%H802><s%> shall have a son <S%H1121><s%>. And Sarah <S%H8283><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> door <S%H6607><s%>, which was behind him <S%H310><s%>.

Now Abraham <S%H85><s%> and Sarah <S%H8283><s%> were old <S%H2205><s%>, and well stricken <S%H935><s%> in age <S%H3117><s%>; it had ceased <S%H2308><s%> to be with Sarah <S%H8283><s%> after the manner <S%H734><s%> of women <S%H802><s%>.

And Sarah <S%H8283><s%> laughed <S%H6711><s%> within herself <S%H7130><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, After <S%H310><s%> I am waxed old <S%H1086><s%> shall I have pleasure <S%H5730><s%>, my lord <S%H113><s%> being old also <S%H2204><s%>?

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Abraham <S%H85><s%>, Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> did Sarah <S%H8283><s%> laugh <S%H6711><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Shall I of a surety <S%H552><s%> bear <S%H3205><s%> a child <S%H589><s%>, who am old <S%H2204><s%>?

Is <S%H6381><s%> anything <S%H1697><s%> too hard <S%H6381><s%> for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>? At the set <S%H4150><s%> time I will return <S%H7725><s%> unto thee <S%H6256><s%>, when the season cometh round <S%H2416><s%>, and Sarah <S%H8283><s%> shall have a son <S%H1121><s%>.

Then Sarah <S%H8283><s%> denied <S%H3584><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, I laughed <S%H6711><s%> not <S%H3372><s%>; for she was afraid. And he said <S%H559><s%>, Nay <S%H3808><s%>; but thou didst laugh <S%H6711><s%>.

And the men <S%H582><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> from thence <S%H8259><s%>, and looked toward <S%H6440><s%> Sodom <S%H5467><s%>: and Abraham <S%H85><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> with them to bring them on the way <S%H7971><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Shall I hide <S%H3680><s%> from Abraham <S%H85><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> I do <S%H6213><s%>;

seeing that Abraham <S%H85><s%> shall surely become a great <S%H1419><s%> and mighty <S%H6099><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%>, and all the nations <S%H1471><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall be blessed in him <S%H1288><s%>?

For I have known <S%H3045><s%> him <S%H834><s%>, to the end that he may command <S%H6680><s%> his children <S%H1121><s%> and his household <S%H1004><s%> after him <S%H310><s%>, that they may keep <S%H8104><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, to do <S%H6213><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%> and justice <S%H6666><s%>; to the end that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> may bring <S%H935><s%> upon Abraham <S%H85><s%> that which he hath spoken of him <S%H1696><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Because the cry <S%H2201><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%> and Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%> is great <S%H7227><s%>, and because their sin <S%H2403><s%> is very <S%H3966><s%> grievous <S%H3513><s%>;

I will go down <S%H3381><s%> now <S%H7200><s%>, and see whether they have done <S%H6213><s%> altogether <S%H3617><s%> according to the cry <S%H6818><s%> of it <S%H935><s%>, which is come unto me <S%H3045><s%>; and if not, I will know.

And the men <S%H582><s%> turned <S%H6437><s%> from thence <S%H3212><s%>, and went toward Sodom <S%H5467><s%>: but Abraham <S%H85><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
And Abraham <S%H85><s%> drew near <S%H5066><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Wilt thou consume <S%H5595><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%>?

Peradventure there are <S%H3426><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> righteous <S%H6662><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>: wilt thou consume <S%H5595><s%> and not spare <S%H5375><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> for <S%H4616><s%> the fifty <S%H2572><s%> righteous <S%H6662><s%> that are therein <S%H7130><s%>?

That be far <S%H2486><s%> from thee to do <S%H6213><s%> after this manner <S%H1697><s%>, to slay <S%H4191><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> with the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, that so the righteous <S%H6662><s%> should be as the wicked <S%H7563><s%>; that be far <S%H2486><s%> from thee <S%H8199><s%>: shall not the Judge of all the earth <S%H776><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> right <S%H4941><s%>?

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, If I find <S%H4672><s%> in Sodom <S%H5467><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> righteous <S%H6662><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>, then I will spare <S%H5375><s%> all the place for their sake <S%H4725><s%>.

And Abraham <S%H85><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, Behold now <S%H2974><s%>, I have taken upon me to speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the Lord <S%H136><s%>, who <S%H595><s%> am but dust <S%H6083><s%> and ashes <S%H665><s%>:

peradventure there shall lack <S%H2637><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> of the fifty <S%H2572><s%> righteous <S%H6662><s%>: wilt thou destroy <S%H7843><s%> all the city <S%H5892><s%> for lack of five <S%H2568><s%>? And he said <S%H559><s%>, I will not destroy <S%H7843><s%> it <S%H4672><s%>, if I find there forty <S%H705><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%>.

And he spake <S%H1696><s%> unto him yet again <S%H3254><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Peradventure there shall be forty <S%H705><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> there <S%H559><s%>. And he said, I will not do <S%H6213><s%> it for the forty <S%H705><s%>'s sake.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Oh <S%H4994><s%> let not the Lord <S%H136><s%> be angry <S%H2734><s%>, and I will speak <S%H1696><s%>: peradventure there shall thirty <S%H7970><s%> be found <S%H4672><s%> there <S%H559><s%>. And he said, I will not do <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H4672><s%>, if I find thirty there <S%H7970><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Behold now <S%H2974><s%>, I have taken upon me to speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the Lord <S%H136><s%>: peradventure there shall be twenty <S%H6242><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> there <S%H559><s%>. And he said, I will not destroy <S%H7843><s%> it for the twenty <S%H6242><s%>'s sake.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Oh let not the Lord <S%H136><s%> be angry <S%H2734><s%>, and I will speak <S%H1696><s%> yet <S%H389><s%> but this once <S%H6471><s%>: peradventure ten <S%H6235><s%> shall be found <S%H4672><s%> there <S%H559><s%>. And he said, I will not destroy <S%H7843><s%> it for the ten <S%H6235><s%>'s sake.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> went his way <S%H3212><s%>, as soon as <S%H834><s%> he had left <S%H3615><s%> off communing <S%H1696><s%> with Abraham <S%H85><s%>: and Abraham <S%H85><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> unto his place <S%H4725><s%>.
